text: Boneworks (written as BONEWORKS) is a 2019 first-person shooter VR game. It was made by Stress Level Zero. They also published the game. The game was made to be entirely physics-based. The player controls a virtual body that does what the player tells it to do and reacts to things it moves into in the game world. In Boneworks, players take on the role of Arthur Ford. He is a cybersecurity director who escapes into an unfinished simulated universe. He must fight through surreal architecture and mysterious scenes using experimental physics-based weaponry.
